 UM IT Solutions provides students and graduates with practical learning opportunities in web development. The internship emphasizes real\\-world exposure through live projects, helping interns build technical expertise and industry\\-ready experience.

 As a Web Developer Intern, you will work on live projects involving both front\\-end and back\\-end development. This role is designed to strengthen coding, debugging, and problem\\-solving skills while familiarizing you with modern web development practices.

* Design, develop, and modify websites to ensure functionality and visual appeal
* Build responsive and dynamic web pages and web applications

* Work with modern web development tools and frameworks

* Proficiency in
 **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**
* Familiarity with frameworks such as
 **React, Angular, or Node.js** 
 (preferred)

* Hands\\-on experience with real\\-world web development projects
* Performance\\-based stipend up to ‚Çπ7,499

**‚ÄúWeb Developer Intern Application‚Äù**

* Updated resume

title: Embedded Software Design Engineer ‚Äì Motor Controller
description:
Job Title: Embedded Software Design Engineer ‚Äì Motor Controller,29212
   

  

**Location:** 
 Pune (Baner)
   

  

**Experience:** 
 2‚Äì4 Years
   

  

**Employment Type:** 
 Individual Contributor (IC Role)

 Immediate to 90 Days
   

  

**CTC Range:** 
 ‚Çπ8‚Äì12 LPA (Negotiable based on interview performance)

 Available
   

  

 Role Overview
   

  

 We are looking for an
 **Embedded Software Design Engineer ‚Äì Motor Controller** 
 with hands\\-on experience in motor controller algorithm design. The role involves developing, simulating, and optimizing motor control algorithms for EV and E\\-powertrain applications using modern control design tools.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Design and development of motor controller algorithms
* Development and simulation of motor control applications using tools such as MATLAB/Simulink
* Control system design, analysis, and validation for motor control applications
* Collaboration with hardware and system teams for controller integration
* Support testing, debugging, and performance optimization of motor control software
* Documentation of design, algorithms, and test results


 Must\\-Have Skill Set
   

  

* Minimum 2\\+ years of design experience in the motor controller / controller design industry
* Hands\\-on experience in motor controller algorithm design
* Strong knowledge of control systems design
* Proficiency in MATLAB/Simulink for motor control application development
* Understanding of embedded systems used in motor controllers
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree (BE/BTech) in:
+ Electronics
+ E\\&TC
+ Electrical/Electronics
+ Or a related engineering discipline


 Nice\\-to\\-Have Skill Set
   

  

* Experience in EV, E\\-Powertrain, or motor controller design environments
* Exposure to real\\-time implementation and testing of control algorithms
* Strong interest in electric mobility and power electronics
* Early joiners preferred


 Interview Process
   

  

* 2 rounds of interviews
* Technical assignment (if required)

description:

By leveraging artificial intelligence, innovative teaching methods, and cutting\\-edge technology, PPStack empowers students, professionals, and organizations with the skills and knowledge needed for success in the digital age. The company offers a wide range of services, from AI\\-powered learning platforms and corporate training to career coaching, digital branding, and technology consulting. PPStack‚Äôs mission is to deliver future\\-ready solutions that drive education, digital growth, and career transformation for learners and businesses worldwide.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote Java Intern role. The Java Intern will assist in software development projects, focusing on Java\\-based applications. Day\\-to\\-day responsibilities include writing and testing code, working on Jakarta EE and microservices architecture, implementing design patterns, and collaborating with the team to support various application development tasks. This role provides an excellent opportunity to gain hands\\-on experience while contributing to innovative projects at PPStack.

title: Sr. Software Development Engineer
description:
**About Highspot**
 Highspot is a software product development company and a recognized global leader in the sales enablement category, leveraging cutting\\-edge AI and GenAI technologies at the core of its robust Software\\-as\\-a\\-Service (SaaS) platform. Highspot is revolutionizing how millions of individuals work worldwide. Through its AI\\-powered platform, Highspot drives enterprise transformation to empower sales teams through intelligent content management, training, contextual guidance, customer engagement, meeting intelligence, and actionable analytics. The Highspot platform delivers advanced features tailored to business needs, in a modern design that sales and marketing executives appreciate and is the \\#1 rated sales enablement platform on G2 Crowd.
   

  

 While headquartered in Seattle, Highspot has expanded its footprint across America, Canada, the UK, Germany, Australia, and now India, solidifying its presence in the Asia Pacific markets.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer who will bring creativity and experience as they work collaboratively with a talented team. As a senior full stack engineer, you will be responsible for leading the design and development of core frontend features of the Highspot platform. Our ideal candidate understands how to build customer\\-facing web applications; they are a skilled communicator who enjoys working collaboratively with designers, product managers, and engineers; they are self\\-managed, curious, and resourceful.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Partner with UX, Product Management, Data Science, and other teams to create software that customers love
* Develop clean, reusable, supportable, and well\\-tested RESTful APIs and web services, including Highspot‚Äôs external API
* Optimize and perform enhancements to large\\-scale data services built on top of MongoDB, Postgres, Redis, and other technologies
* Integrate Highspot with external APIs, including third\\-party Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, Content Management Systems (CMS), and other partner applications
* Collaborate with the Data Science team to integrate advanced machine learning models into the application to deliver cutting edge AI features and help solve complex business problems for customers
* Build scalable methodologies, tools, and techniques accompanied by excellent technical documentation
* Stay abreast of new technologies and practices to further enhance team capabilities and your own skill
* Act as a mentor and source for direction, training, and guidance for more junior engineers


**Required Qualifications**
* 6\\-10 years of experience building distributed systems, working with databases, and implementing production\\-ready high quality features
* Proficiency in building, integrating with, and supporting APIs and web services using a variety of languages, data formats, and data transformations
* Demonstrated ability to effectively collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to develop and deliver high\\-quality applications
* An entrepreneurial spirit: you‚Äôre agile, creative, resourceful, and tenacious as you solve problems and achieve team and company goals
* Comfortable with modern open source technologies and tools
* Experience developing software products, scalable internet software, and applications using a range of software models including object\\-oriented and functional design patterns
* Hands on experience in Ruby is an added advantage

title: GenAI Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
* Position: Gen Ai Engineer
* Location: Hyderabad
* Experience: 5 to 8 years
* Employment Type: contract


**Company Name: Pozent Corporation**
* Pozent is a rapidly growing company focused on delivering next\\-generation digital, data, and AI\\-driven solutions to global clients and achieve measurable business outcomes.
* Our team is geared towards innovation and thrives where talent meets opportunity.
* We work on Generative AI, Cloud, Data Engineering, Automation, and Full\\-Stack Development, delivering impactful projects


**Why join us:**
* Exciting Global Projects and career growth: Work directly with top clients and cutting\\-edge technologies providing a rapid learning curve, skill development, and clear career progression.
* Innovation Culture and supportive environment: You are not just joining a company ‚Äî you‚Äôre becoming part of a dynamic innovation ecosystem that empowers you to learn, explore, create, grow and lead.


**Role Overview**
 Build and deploy generative AI solutions using LLM fine\\-tuning, RAG architectures, and agentic AI systems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Fine\\-tune large language models for domain\\-specific applications and use cases
* Design and implement RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) pipelines with vector databases
* Build agentic AI systems with autonomous decision\\-making and tool\\-using capabilities
* Optimize LLM performance through prompt engineering, parameter tuning, and model selection
* Develop and deploy production\\-ready GenAI applications and APIs
* Evaluate model performance, conduct A/B testing, and iterate on solutions
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate GenAI into products


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, AI/ML, or related field
* Strong experience with LLM fine\\-tuning (LoRA, QLoRA, full fine\\-tuning, PEFT methods)
* Proven expertise building RAG systems with vector databases and embeddings
* Hands\\-on experience developing agentic AI solutions and multi\\-agent systems
* Proficiency with LLM frameworks (LangChain, LlamaIndex, Haystack)
* Experience with vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, ChromaDB, FAISS)
* Strong Python programming skills
* Understanding of transformer architectures and LLM APIs


**Preferred**
* Experience with distributed training and GPU optimization
* Knowledge of MLOps, model deployment, and monitoring
* Familiarity with Hugging Face ecosystem
* Experience with prompt optimization and evaluation frameworks
* Understanding of LLM safety, alignment, and guardrails
* Background in NLP or deep learning research


**Why This Role**
* A seasoned SharePoint Developer ensures seamless customization, integration, and ongoing support, helping the organization maximize the value of M365 tools like Power Automate, Power Apps, Teams, and OneDrive.

title: General Interest Application
description:
**About Loti AI, Inc**
 Our names, our faces, our voices, our personas and our memories are some of the most fundamental things we call uniquely our own. We carry them throughout our lives and share versions of them with those we spend our limited time with. Loti‚Äôs mission is to make sure that who you are remains within your control. That everyone has the right to be remembered or forgotten and that technology should aid, not hinder, us in this effort. AI is a powerful tool, but we can‚Äôt let the hammer become the architect.
   

  

 Loti will promote human creativity and individuality by protecting those who share their gifts.
   

  

 At Loti AI, we‚Äôre building the infrastructure to protect digital identity at scale. Our platform helps public figures, creators, and brands safeguard their likeness and content across the internet. As AI\\-generated impersonation and deepfakes rise, we believe everyone should control how they show up online.
   

  

**Role And Responsibilities**
 Loti AI is a growing technology company working at the intersection of AI, digital identity, and digital rights. As we continue to scale, we‚Äôre always interested in connecting with thoughtful, curious people who are excited about the work we‚Äôre doing. If you don‚Äôt see an open role that aligns with your background right now, you‚Äôre welcome to submit a
 ****general interest application****
 . We review these applications as new opportunities open across the company.
   

  

**Who Should Apply**
* Candidates interested in future roles across:


- 

* Engineering
* Go\\-To\\-Market
* Product \\& Design
* Operations
* Marketing \\& Communications
* Research \\& Policy
* Finance \\& Administration
* People who want to be considered as the team grows


**What To Submit**
* Resume
* A brief note about your background, interests, the type of role you‚Äôre looking for, why you‚Äôre interested in Loti and why you should be on our team.


**What To Expect**
* Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis
* We may reach out if a role opens that aligns with your experience
* Submission does not guarantee an interview


****Why Join Loti AI?****
 At Loti AI, we are pioneering digital likeness protection and setting the highest standards in a rapidly evolving landscape.
   

  

* Dynamic, high\\-performance, ambitious culture where highly accountable individuals are empowered to take ownership, deliver impact and drive results.
* We‚Äôre creating an entirely new market that didn‚Äôt exist 10 years ago. With the proliferation of deepfakes and adoption of new legislation to combat them, we‚Äôre at the intersection of a critical need for both generative AI companies and high\\-profile individuals.
* You‚Äôll be joining us at a sweet spot where the company is still early but significantly de\\-risked.
* You will have ownership and strong influence over our core processes, directly driving success for Loti, our clients, our partners, and you.


****Loti AI is an equal opportunity employer.****
 We value diverse backgrounds, ideas, and lived experiences.
   

  

 Compensation offered will be determined by a number of factors including job\\-related knowledge, domain knowledge, skills, skill level, relevant years of experience, geographic location and interview performance.

title: GPT Plugin Developer(Freelance | WFH)
description:
**About BeGig** 




 BeGig is the leading tech freelancing marketplace. We empower innovative, early\\-stage, non\\-tech founders to bring their visions to life by connecting them with top\\-tier freelance talent. By joining BeGig, you're not just taking on one role‚Äîyou‚Äôre signing up for a platform that will continuously match you with high\\-impact opportunities tailored to your expertise.
 



  





**Your Opportunity** 




 Join our network as a GPT Plugin Developer and help startups build powerful tools that extend the capabilities of GPT through plugin interfaces. You‚Äôll work with OpenAI‚Äôs plugin framework to connect GPT with APIs, databases, and real\\-time services‚Äîenabling the model to perform actions and fetch live data.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 As a GPT Plugin Developer, you will:
 


* Design, build, and deploy custom plugins for GPT\\-4
* Create OpenAPI specs and manifest files that enable safe and structured tool usage
* Integrate external APIs to allow GPT to search, book, retrieve, or execute real\\-world tasks



  





**What You‚Äôll Do** 



* Build backend services and APIs that act as tools for GPT plugins
* Write accurate OpenAPI specs and manifest files for plugin registration
* Implement authentication, rate\\-limiting, and security controls
* Test and refine plugin behavior in the ChatGPT environment
* Support plugin deployment for internal tools or public listing



  





**Technical Requirements** 



* 3\\+ years of experience in backend or full stack development
* Proficient in Python, Node.js, or similar backend frameworks
* Strong understanding of OpenAPI specs and API design
* Familiarity with deploying and managing secure web services
* Experience with GPT\\-4 plugin architecture and plugin developer tools
* Bonus: experience with OAuth, serverless deployment, and observability tools



  





**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 



* A backend\\-savvy developer who can build fast, secure, and scalable plugins
* A freelancer who enjoys working at the frontier of AI and real\\-world integrations
* Someone who understands both system design and AI interaction dynamics



  





**Why Join Us** 



* Build real GPT\\-4 plugins that power intelligent automation
* Fully remote, flexible, and project\\-based opportunities
* Get matched with startups looking to build unique AI capabilities
* Be part of the AI tools ecosystem shaping the future of productivity and decision\\-making



  





 Ready to turn GPT into a real\\-world action machine? Apply now to become a GPT Plugin Developer with BeGig.

description:

 Architectural and Strategic Leadership
 


* Define Testing Architecture: Architect and drive the implementation of next\\-generation automation and performance testing frameworks, ensuring high scalability, robustness, and maintainability across all product lines.
* Best Practices and Standards: Establish and enforce quality engineering best practices, coding standards, and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines across the entire testing organization.

 Core Technical Focus Areas

 Required Qualifications

title: Test Automation & Cloud Infrastructure Specialist
job_function: Engineering, Information Technology, and Quality Assurance
description:
**About Orica** 




  





 At Orica, it‚Äôs the power of our people that leads change and shapes our futures. Every day, all around the world, our people help mobilise vital resources essential to progress. Established in 1874, we have grown to become the world leader in mining and civil blasting with a diverse of team of more than 13,000 across the world.
 



  





 It‚Äôs an exciting time to join us ‚Äì we are shaping the future of mining through digital and automated technologies, embracing new ways of thinking, pioneering innovation and reimagining the way we work.
 



  





**About the role** 




  





 Orica is a global leader in mining and blasting solutions, and our Data, Analytics \\& AI team is building the digital foundations that support Orica‚Äôs global operations. We‚Äôre looking for a
 **Test Automation \\& Cloud Infrastructure Specialist** 
 who can help us create reliable, scalable, and automated cloud environments that power our data and analytics products.
 



  





 As a
 **Test Automation \\& Cloud Infrastructure Specialist** 
 , you will work at the intersection of
 **test automation** 
 ,
 **DevOps** 
 , and
 **cloud platform engineering** 
 . Your job is to make sure that Orica‚Äôs data and analytics products run on secure, stable, and fully automated cloud environments ‚Äî while ensuring that every product meets the highest quality standards before it reaches users.
 



  





 This is a hands\\-on engineering role where you will design automation frameworks, build cloud infrastructure using IaC, strengthen CI/CD pipelines, and support the systems that keep Orica‚Äôs data platform running smoothly.
 



  





 If you‚Äôre passionate about test automation, cloud engineering, and building efficient, secure, and scalable data platforms ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to hear from you.
 



  





**What you will be doing** 




  




* Build automated testing frameworks to remove manual QA bottlenecks and ensure high product quality.
* Create and manage cloud infrastructure using IaC (Terraform) to support scalable, secure environments.
* Enhance CI/CD pipelines for continuous testing, deployment, and smooth releases.
* Implement monitoring and observability to detect issues early and maintain platform reliability.
* Collaborate with engineering, BI, cybersecurity, and platform teams to deliver integrated, high‚Äëquality solutions.
* Support the full product lifecycle from design to testing, deployment, and ongoing maintenance.
* Contribute to platform governance and standards aligned with Orica‚Äôs architecture, security, and IT guidelines.
* Drive innovation by recommending new tools, automation practices, and improvements to platform workflows.



  





**What you will bring** 




  




* Strong coding skills in Terraform, Python, and SQL
* 10\\+ years in IT, with experience in multiple areas such as:
* SAP, Data Management, ETL, Data Analytics, Data Visualisation, Data Warehousing, Cloud Data Services, API Management
* Experience working in global organisations using Agile and DevOps
* Knowledge of cloud platforms (Azure, GCP, or SAP cloud environments)
* Strong problem‚Äësolving and stakeholder management skills
* Ability to work with multi‚Äësourced teams (contractors, vendors, internal teams)
* Excellent communication skills with technical and non‚Äëtechnical stakeholders
* Initiative and the ability to anticipate problems before they occur



  





**What we offer** 




  





 As part of a truly global company, you will have the ability to grow and learn in a diverse, collaborative culture. We foster relationships and learning through connected global and local teams, promote flexible and diverse career paths and support the development of your knowledge and skills.
 



  





 You will be paid a competitive salary, learn from talented individuals across multiple disciplines and be able to thrive in a safe workplace within a collaborative culture. Ignite your career at a place where your distinct potential can find its home.
 



  





**We respect and value all** 




  





 Orica promotes and fosters a culture of inclusion and Equal Opportunity Employment everywhere we operate. We treat our people and applicants with fairness, dignity, and respect, getting the best of everyone‚Äôs contributions.
 



  





 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, nationality, age, military or veteran, marital or disability status.
